entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:51 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow or ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
